block.p: YOU may not become the doyenne of American retro style (like Martha Stewart), but using some of her catalog's new vintage-style merchandise could get you off to a good start. Among summer serving pieces, the two-and-a-half-gallon wide-mouth glass barrel jar with a wire and wood handle, a design from the 1920's, is perfect for carrying iced tea or coffee to a picnic; $25. Steel kitchen storage boxes in white or pale green come with or without painted labels for bread, coffee, tea, biscuits, sugar or flour; $35 to $62. Pressed-glass storage jars with white or green metal lids hold a gallon; $16 a pair.
